Text:
Do not upload the same item more than once.
Your previous uploads of this have been deleted.

Tracks 7, 13, 14, 16, 19, 20, 21, 27, 28, 29, 33, 34, 35 and 49 are corrupted. I can't get them to play on VLC, and on WMP, I can't sync or burn them. Can it be fixed, please? I would be very grateful.
I have no idea why those tracks are corrupted for you and I don't know a way to solve it. Really sorry. Everything is fine at my end...
No worries. I'll just set about ripping my own versions. :)
